1.c: This json defines the functions and rules for running spinup
2.c: funAddInputs: are the last three variables needed to runCoreTEM(f,fe,fx,s,d,p,info,doPrecOnce,doCore,doSpinUp)
3.c: sequence: for each block of sequence, funHandleSpin is repeated nLoops times in different modes defined by funAddInputs

rules.9.c: should be the name of the function that reads the spinup data
rules.4.c: use the above field to give the name of the function that returns the forcing structure fSU and infoSU with flexibitiy to plug whatever in
rules.5.c: Make sure that the variables and the units of forcing are same as forcing.json
rules.6.c: only has the f structure variable swith the forcing inside
rules.7.c: if prepForcingFromFile is empty then the following flags will be used to generate forcing for spinup
